bindHelp.title: Support chat is not linked
bindHelp.paragraph1: You need to start your connected bot with the /start command so that you become an administrator in it.
bindHelp.paragraph2: Then create a group superchat with topics enabled and add the bot there as an administrator.
bindHelp.paragraph3: After that, in the General topic, run a command like /bind @{{bot_username}} to link the bot to the chat and start receiving user messages.

firstLaunch.welcome: Welcome to the GraceHub bot management platform!
firstLaunch.description: The platform lets you create your own support and feedback bot for users and customers, which you can connect to a Telegram supergroup with topics enabled. You can handle support and respond to customer requests directly in Telegram!
firstLaunch.step2: Tap "Add new bot" and send the token.
firstLaunch.step3: After the instance is created, the control panel and stats will appear here.
firstLaunch.addBotHint: Add your Telegram bot using the token from @BotFather. I will automatically connect it to the GraceHub panel.
